findings.title: Contract owners can change the maximum supply after the contract is deployed
findings.description: The owner of the smart contract has the ability to alter the maximum token supply even after the contract's deployment.

findings.title: Mint Function Accessibility
findings.description: The mint function allows anyone to mint MMNFT despite technical specifications stating only whitelisted users can do so.

findings.title: Outdated Code Version
findings.description: An outdated version of the code is being used. The new version has some gas optimizations and code improvements.

findings.title: Unused 'initialized' Variable
findings.description: The 'initialized' variable is declared but not utilized within the smart contract.
